name: Castle of Nightmares
description:
Try to escape the castle! A short RPG horror game with 2D animated elements. Coded in Processing. Graphics made in Photoshop and Procreate.

This is my first game, it's far from perfect but hope you enjoy :'') LMK if there are any issues.

CREDITS //
